details:
PostgreSQL project reports:

> A security vulnerability was found in the system views pg\_stats\_ext
> and pg\_stats\_ext\_exprs, potentially allowing authenticated database
> users to see data they shouldn't. If this is of concern in your
> installation, run the SQL script /usr/local/share/postgresql/fix-CVE-2024-4317.sql
> for each of your databases. See the link for details.
summary: PostgreSQL server -- Potentially allowing authenicated database users to see data that they shouldn't.
